gen:link.msg:message: `GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationAssimilation` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `Sector` is equal to `po`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationAssimilation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationAssimilation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipation` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfGovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfGovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfGovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfGovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
